author: "Keith Galli"
title: "🎬 Movie Data Analysis Report"
subtitle: "Exploring TMDB Movie Dataset"
date: today
format:
    html: 
        theme: flatly
        toc: true
        toc-location: left
        code-fold: true
        code-summary: "Show code"
        smooth-scroll: true
        css: simple-style.css
    pdf:
        execute:
            echo: false
            warning: false
            error: false
            fig-width: 7
            fig-height: 5
        geometry: margin=1in
fig-width: 8
fig-height: 5
execute:
    warning: false
    message: false
---

::: {.hero-banner}
# 🎭 Welcome to Movie Data Insights
*Discover trends, patterns, and stories hidden in thousands of movies*
:::

## 📊 Dataset Overview

::: {.cell execution_count=1}

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
📁 Dataset contains 3,940 movies
📅 Date range: 1902-04-17 to 2023-08-16
⭐ Average rating: 6.8/10
💰 Total revenue: $564.3B
```
:::
:::


## 📈 Movie Release Trends

::: {.cell execution_count=2}

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display}
![Distribution of movie releases over the years shows the evolution of cinema](html-report_files/figure-pdf/fig-year-dist-output-1.png){#fig-year-dist fig-align='center'}
:::
:::


The movie industry has seen remarkable growth, with a significant increase in productions starting from the 1990s.

::: {.content-visible when-format="html"}

## 🎯 Interactive Movie Explorer

Explore the relationship between audience engagement and movie quality across different genres:

::: {.cell execution_count=3}

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display}
```
Unable to display output for mime type(s): text/html
```

Interactive scatter plot showing vote count vs average rating by genre
:::

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display}
```
Unable to display output for mime type(s): text/html
```
:::
:::


:::

## ☁️ Popular Keywords

What themes and concepts dominate cinema? Let's find out:

::: {.cell execution_count=4}

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display}
![Word cloud revealing the most common themes in movie keywords](html-report_files/figure-pdf/cell-5-output-1.png){fig-align='center'}
:::
:::


## 🎭 Genre Landscape

::: {.cell fig-height='6' fig-width='10' execution_count=5}

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display}
![Distribution of movies across different genres](html-report_files/figure-pdf/cell-6-output-1.png){fig-align='center'}
:::
:::


---

## 🎲 Featured Movie

Let's spotlight a random movie from our dataset:



::: {.movie-spotlight}

### Top Gun ({`python} year`})

::: {.columns}

::: {.column width="30%"}
![Movie Poster](https://image\.tmdb\.org/t/p/w600\_and\_h900\_bestv2/xUuHj3CgmZQ9P2cMaqQs4J0d4Zc\.jpg){width="100%"}
:::

::: {.column width="70%"}

**Genre:** Romance  
**Rating:** ⭐ 7\.0/10

**Synopsis:**  
For Lieutenant Pete 'Maverick' Mitchell and his friend and co\-pilot Nick 'Goose' Bradshaw\, being accepted into an elite training school for fighter pilots is a dream come true\. But a tragedy\, as well as personal demons\, will threaten Pete's dreams of becoming an ace pilot\.

:::

:::

:::

---

## 📝 Key Insights

::: {.insights-grid}

::: {.insight-card}
**📈 Industry Growth**  
The film industry has experienced exponential growth, particularly from the 1990s onwards.
:::

::: {.insight-card}
**🎭 Genre Diversity**  
Drama and comedy remain the most popular genres, but the landscape shows rich diversity.
:::

::: {.insight-card}
**⭐ Quality vs Popularity**  
There's an interesting relationship between vote count and ratings across different genres.
:::

:::

*Analysis completed on July 08\, 2025*
